A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A terrible film\, and a horrendous Star Wars instalment. Poorly written plot\, poorly written characters (I feel sorry for Mark Hamill) \"That's how we're gonna win. Not fighting what we hate\, saving what we love\"... even the one-liners are awful. I blame Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy\, and to the Star Wars fans who make excuses for this movie\, shame on you!
